entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
